attributes.title: Chicken Predicts NFL Playoff Losers
attributes.description: Sportsball's very own psychic chicken, Barbara, predicts the losers of the NFL Playoffs in her own special way.... Check out Sportsball every Tuesday at 5pm CT on Rooster Teeth.comBarbara The Chicken provided by the Kusch family

attributes.title: Chicken Predicts NFL Playoff Losers #2
attributes.description: Barbara is back! This week she's picking the Conference Championship losers...in the only way she knows how. Check out Sportsball every Tuesday at 5pm CT on Rooster Teeth.comBarbara The Chicken provided by the Kusch family

attributes.title: Sports in 60 Seconds: Carolina v Arizona - SB EXTRA
attributes.description: Stan accurately re-enacts the Panthers/Cardinals game.

attributes.title: PSA: Kickers Are People Too - SB EXTRA
attributes.description: Kickers are people too. Rooster Teeth has created the first ever PSA addressing the national epidemic of abused kickers in today's world. Do your part and sacrifice your time to learn about how YOU can help change the life of someone who has wrecked yours.

attributes.title: Coe Eats Crow - #20
attributes.description: Join Jack Pattillo, Tyler Coe and Shannon McCormick as they discuss "Billy" Manziel in Las Vegas, the NFL Coaching Carousel and the Saga of Jim Tomsula, KU vs OU, TCU vs ORE, Watermelon eating, Bad Pitching, Lacrosse, Buffalo fans on fire, "eating crow", the College Football Playoffs, the NFL playoffs, a special message from Funhaus and more on this week's episode of Sportsball!
